Headline: #72 North Temporary Eastbound Reroute near North Ave/Damen
ShortDescription: Eastbound 72 North buses are temporarily rerouted via North Ave, Western, Division, Damen and North Ave: due to, street blockage near North Ave/Damen.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #72 North buses are temporarily rerouted via North Ave, Western, Division, Damen and North Ave: due to, street blockage near North Ave/Damen.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Ashland. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at Ashland.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
